Definition at line 23 of file IDocumentMetaInfo.h.

enum idoc::IDocumentMetaInfo::MetaInfoType
Enumerator:
MIT_AUTHOR 

Person, who has created the document.

MIT_CREATOR 

Tool used for document creation.

MIT_DESCRIPTION 

Document description.

MIT_CREATION_TIME 

Document creation time.

MIT_MODIFICATION_TIME 

Last document modification time.

MIT_USER 

Starting of user defined meta info types.
